entry.title: What is Parse Server?
entry.summary: Parse Server is an open source Backend-as-a-Service(BaaS) framework initially developed by Facebook. The platform now has an active and robust community of fanatical developers who constantly innovate and strive to improve the already impressive and modular platform. Below are some...
entry.content:
Parse Server is an open source Backend-as-a-Service(BaaS) framework initially developed by Facebook. The platform now has an active and robust community of fanatical developers who constantly innovate and strive to improve the already impressive and modular platform. Below are some of the amazing and most useful features of Parse Server.

See this
